attributes.action: fund Housing Associations to carry out property insulation, etc. in accordance with the 'Warm Front' Government funded initiative.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People living in owner-occupied property or having a private landlord can apply for benefits under 'Warm Front' to insulate and heat their abode, but not so if one is unfortunate enough to be living in a Housing Association's accomodation.
Global Warming is supposed to be being tackled by the Government, so why the discrimination?
Extra funding is required for Housing Associations to be able to carry out the necessary work in line with Government policy.
I am 70-years-old and live in a flat affected by this unfair system: I have to pay for gas and electricity for heating and lighting; 25% of the heat being lost through walls. 
People living here vary from 55 to 95-years-old!
This situation is replicated throughout the country, affecting millions of people.
